Key: Oh, Tohka...

(So, Tohka really did head to class early.
How unlike her...)
Translation: (Así que Tohka sí que iba pronto a clase. Qué raro...)

Key: Zzz...zzz...

Oh. Tohka, it's nice of you to come early,
but not if you're asleep.
Translation: Oh. Tohka, es muy amable de tu parte venir temprano, pero no si estás durmiendo.

Key:
(Was she up that late last night...?
Yet she's here at school so early.)
Translation: (¿Estuvo despierta hasta tan tarde anoche...? Y sin embargo está aquí en la escuela tan temprano).

Key: (Hmm, I don't get her.)

(But man... She's so carefree.
I guess that's what makes her
so cute...)
Translation: (Pero hombre... Es tan despreocupada. Supongo que eso es lo que la hace tan mona...)

Key:
(Oh... I guess I'll pretend that I didn't see
the drool coming out of her mouth...)
Translation: (Oh... supongo que fingiré que no vi la baba que salía de su boca...)

Key:
(Hm?! Wh-What is that?! It feels like I'm
being watched all of a sudden!)
Translation: (¡¿Qué es eso?! ¡Me siento como si me estuvieran observando de repente!)

Key: Y-Yo... Oh, it's you, Origami! Morning.
Translation: Y-Yo... ¡Oh, eres tú, Origami! Buenos días.

Key: Morning.
(Is it me, or does she seem angry?)

(All right. Made it past my afternoon class
despite feeling ready to doze off!)
Translation: (De acuerdo. He pasado la clase de la tarde a pesar de estar a punto de dormirme).

Key: *snore*... Zzzz...*snore*... Zzz...

(T-Tohka... ended up sleeping through the
whole class. Oh well, guess I can wake her
up so we can eat lunch together.)
Translation: (T-Tohka... terminó durmiendo toda la clase. Oh bueno, supongo que puedo despertarla para que podamos almorzar juntas).

Key: Hey Tohka, wake up already. Wanna eat lunch?!
*yawn*...

You slept through the whole class, yet you're
still tired?
Translation: ¿Te has dormido toda la clase y sigues cansado?

Key: Hm?! Sh-Shido?! What time is it?!
It's lunch time. Rinne made us lu—
Translation: Es hora de comer. Rinne nos hizo lu-

Key: HM?! Lunch, you say?! Wait, Shido!
Hm? What is it?
Sh-Shido! Eat this at once!
What's this...?

(Tohka handed me what appeared to be
a hastily-packed bento box, with a ribbon
that was sloppily tied.)
Translation: (Tohka me entrega lo que parece ser una caja de bento empaquetada a toda prisa, con una cinta atada de forma descuidada).

Key: I-I tried making lunch!

What?! To-Tohka, you made this? All by
yourself?
Y-Yes!

(Oh...! Wait... So the one moving about
downstairs last night was Tohka?!)
Translation: (¡Oh...! Espera... ¡¿Así que la que se movía por las escaleras anoche era Tohka?!)

Key:
Sh...Shido, do you not want to eat
the lunch I made?
Translation: Sh... Shido, ¿no quieres comer el almuerzo que hice?

Key: No! It's not that, but...

(What do I do?! We also have Rinne's bento,
who made them in the middle of her morning
rush...)
Translation: (¡¿Qué hago?! También tenemos el bento de Rinne, que los hizo en medio de sus prisas matutinas...)

Key:
(But Tohka—judging from how she's acting—
must've spent all night making this, and she
left just before Rinne came downstairs.)
Translation: (Pero Tohka -a juzgar por cómo actúa- debe de haberse pasado toda la noche haciendo esto, y se fue justo antes de que Rinne bajara).

Key:
(Tohka worked so hard for my sake...
C-Could I really betray her...?)
Translation: (Tohka trabajó tan duro por mi bien... ¿Realmente podría traicionarla...?)

Key: Eat Tohka's bento.
Offer her Rinne's bento.
Run for it.
